article_title: Dave Camp's Most Valuable Contribution to Tax Reform

article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: By Howard Gleckman and Bill Gale House Ways & Means Committee chair Dave Camp’s most important contribution to the tax reform debate may be this: By proposing a specific, transparent, and fully-realized reform plan, he has made it far tougher for others to credibly promise trillions of dollars in tax cuts [...]
